attributes.action: 3G and Faster Broadband in Rural Areas
attributes.additional_details:
In Rural Areas do you find that you have a slow Internet connection or lack of 3G. Well this can spoil a lot of local business and people who enjoy going on the net. Well these people can't really do much at all. These broadband companies false advertise how much meg you are allowed. In average a rural area has less than 1.5 meg. Where as urban areas have more than that.

Ofcom hear our words: the Internet is widely being used, so please give us a chance of have faster connections in rural places. Instead of wasting our money what we work for, so we suspect faster Internet
